snippet: That attack in November, by a gunman who is now in custody, left three people dead and caused the clinic in Colorado Springs, Colo., to close for almost three months.
abstract: Colorado Springs Planned Parenthood clinic reopens after November 2015 shooting in which anti-abortion gunman Robert L Dear Jr killed three people.
lead_paragraph: That attack in November, by a gunman who is now in custody, left three people dead and caused the clinic in Colorado Springs, Colo., to close for almost three months.

headline.main: Colorado Planned Parenthood Clinic Reopens After Deadly Attack
headline.print_headline: Planned Parenthood Clinic in Colorado Springs Reopens After Deadly Shootings
